GeneralInformation.School Mission: Every child to be developed holistically, have global awareness, love Singapore and love to learn
School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Our philosophy is 'To bring out the best in every child, Together' and we want to bring out the best in every student by working closely with our stakeholders and partners because we firmly believe in the adage that it takes a village to raise a child.

It is also our belief that good character comes before anything else. Hence our foremost concern is that our students excel in character first, before he excels in other areas. Thus our motto 'Excel with Character' is communicated to our students and they subscribe to the fact that even as they excel in other areas, it must be with good character, and if they excel in other areas, but are not of good character, then everything comes to naught.

We have 4 school values to guides our students in developing their character : Care, Integrity, Resilience and Responsibility. We want our students to be kind and show consideration for others, to be honest and truthful, to remain strong and never give up even in the face of challenges and setbacks, and to have the responsibility to take the initiative to act independently and do the right thing.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: Government School / Co-ed School / Single Session

School Distinctive Programmes.Sports & Outdoor Education: Character Development through Outdoor Adventure Education (OAE)

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: Learning for Life Programme : Outdoor Adventure Education (OAE). Our OAE programme provides students with rich hands-on experiences to help them discover their talents, strengths and weaknesses and work towards achieving success. It also builds resilience, perseverance, creativity and courage as students learn to overcome personal challenges. Through OAE, we also inculcate in our students a sense of responsibility for themselves, others as well as nature and the environment. OAE enhances our students' schooling experiences by developing them into rugged, responsible, innovative and confident youths with a 'can-do' spirit to take them into the volatile, uncertain, complex and ambiguous world.
